@sainak @Jacobjeevan @rithviknishad

Turns out the note field is missing in the backend class handling this, which is likely causing the issue.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ef7bd903-a7eb-4a1a-b49f-64e536efc3c8)

Since Iâ€™ve already spent quite some time debugging and confirming this, Iâ€™d like to work on fixing it from the backend side if thatâ€™s okay. Please let me know.
